title: GKN, fighting off Melrose, says pension safe under its plan
text: March 20, 2018 / 7:19 AM / Updated 41 minutes ago GKN, fighting off Melrose, says pension safe under its plan Reuters Staff 1 Min Read LONDON, March 20 (Reuters) - British engineering company GKN , target of a takeover bid, said on it had a plan in place to protect its pension scheme, as the issue emerged as the latest battleground between GKN management and hostile suitor Melrose. “GKN has a clear and comprehensive plan to reduce its pension liabilities and eliminate the deficit in its UK pension schemes. We have a binding agreement with the Trustees which works for all stakeholders: the scheme members, the Trustees and the company and its shareholders,” GKN’s finance director Jos Sclater said in a statement on Tuesday. (Reporting by Sarah Young, Editing by Paul Sandle)
